00051 struct Shape {
00052 
00053   enum LineCap { ButtCap = 0, RoundCap, SquareCap };
00054   enum LineJoin { MiterJoin = 0, RoundJoin, BevelJoin };
00055   enum LineStyle { SolidStyle = 0,
00056        DashStyle, 
00057        DotStyle,
00058        DashDotStyle,
00059        DashDotDotStyle,
00060        DashDotDotDotStyle };
00061 
00070   inline Shape( DGtal::Color penColor, DGtal::Color fillColor,
00071     double lineWidth, 
00072     LineStyle style,
00073     const LineCap cap,
00074     const LineJoin join,
00075     int depth );
00076   
00080   virtual ~Shape() { }
00081 
00087   virtual const std::string & name() const;
00088 
00094   virtual Shape * clone() const = 0;
00095   
00101   inline bool filled() const { return _fillColor != DGtal::Color::None; }
00102   
00108   virtual Point center() const = 0;
00109   
00118   virtual Shape & rotate( double angle, const Point & center ) = 0;
00119 
00127   virtual Shape & rotate( double angle ) = 0;
00128 
00137   inline Shape & rotateDeg( double angle, const Point & center );
00138   
00147   inline Shape & rotateDeg( double angle );
00148 
00157   virtual Shape & translate( double dx, double dy ) = 0;
00158 
00167   virtual Shape & scale( double sx, double sy ) = 0;
00168 
00176   virtual Shape & scale( double s ) = 0;
00177  
00183   virtual Rect boundingBox() const = 0;
00184 
00185   
00190   inline Rect bbox();
00191   
00192 
00198   inline Shape & operator--();
00199 
00205   inline Shape & operator++();
00206 
00207 
00214   virtual void scaleAll( double s ) = 0;
00215 
00216 
00224   virtual void flushPostscript( std::ostream & stream,
00225         const TransformEPS & transform ) const = 0;
00226 
00234   virtual void flushFIG( std::ostream & stream,
00235        const TransformFIG & transform,
00236        std::map<DGtal::Color,int> & colormap ) const = 0;
00237 
00245   virtual void flushSVG( std::ostream & stream,
00246        const TransformSVG & transform ) const = 0;
00247 
00248 #ifdef WITH_CAIRO
00249 
00256   virtual void flushCairo( cairo_t *cr,
00257        const TransformCairo & transform ) const = 0;
00258 #endif
00259 
00260   inline int depth() const;
00261 
00262   virtual void depth( int );
00263 
00264   virtual void shiftDepth( int shift );
00265   
00266   inline const DGtal::Color & penColor() const;
00267 
00268   inline const DGtal::Color & fillColor() const;
00269 
00270 private:
00271   static const std::string _name; 
00273 protected:
00274 
00275   int _depth;        
00276   DGtal::Color _penColor;    
00277   DGtal::Color _fillColor;    
00278   double _lineWidth;  
00279   LineStyle _lineStyle;  
00280   LineCap _lineCap;    
00281   LineJoin _lineJoin;  
00289   std::string svgProperties( const TransformSVG & transform ) const;
00290 
00291   
00297   std::string postscriptProperties() const;
00298 
00299 #ifdef WITH_CAIRO
00300   // cairo
00306   void setCairoDashStyle(cairo_t *cr, LineStyle type) const;
00307 #endif
00308 };
00309 
00310   
00311 inline Rect
00312 Shape::bbox()
00313 {
00314   return this->boundingBox();
00315 }
00316   
00317   
00318 inline Shape &
00319 Shape::operator++()
00320 {
00321   ++_depth;
00322   return *this;
00323 }
00324 
00325 inline Shape &
00326 Shape::operator--()
00327 {
00328   --_depth;
00329   return *this;
00330 }
00331 
00332 
00333 inline int
00334 Shape::depth() const
00335 {
00336   return _depth;
00337 }
00338 
00339 inline const DGtal::Color &
00340 Shape::penColor() const
00341 {
00342   return _penColor;
00343 }
00344 
00345 const DGtal::Color &
00346 Shape::fillColor() const
00347 {
00348   return _fillColor;
00349 }
00350 
00351 Shape &
00352 Shape::rotateDeg( double angle, const Point & aCenter )
00353 {
00354   return rotate( angle * ( M_PI / 180.0 ), aCenter ); 
00355 }
00356 
00357 Shape &
00358 Shape::rotateDeg( double angle )
00359 {
00360   return rotate( angle * ( M_PI / 180.0 ), center() ); 
00361 }

00722 struct Polyline : public Shape { 
00723   inline Polyline( const std::vector<Point> & points, 
00724        bool closed,
00725        DGtal::Color penColor, DGtal::Color fillColor,
00726        double lineWidth,
00727        const LineStyle lineStyle = SolidStyle,
00728        const LineCap cap = ButtCap,
00729        const LineJoin join = MiterJoin,
00730        int depth = -1 );
00731 
00732   inline Polyline( const Path & path, 
00733        DGtal::Color penColor, DGtal::Color fillColor,
00734        double lineWidth,
00735        const LineStyle lineStyle = SolidStyle,
00736        const LineCap cap = ButtCap,
00737        const LineJoin join = MiterJoin,
00738        int depth = -1 );
00739 
00740   inline Polyline( bool closed, DGtal::Color penColor, DGtal::Color fillColor,
00741        double lineWidth,
00742        const LineStyle lineStyle = SolidStyle,
00743        const LineCap cap = ButtCap,
00744        const LineJoin join = MiterJoin,
00745        int depth = -1 );
00746       
00752   const std::string & name() const;
00753 
00754   Point center() const;
00755 
00763   Polyline & operator<<( const Point & p );
00764 
00772   Point & operator[]( const unsigned int n ) {
00773     return _path[ n ];
00774   }
00775 
00776 
00777   Polyline & rotate( double angle, const Point & center );
00778 
00787   Polyline rotated( double angle, const Point & center ) const;
00788 
00789   Polyline & rotate( double angle );
00790   
00798   Polyline rotated( double angle ) const;
00799 
00800   Polyline & translate( double dx, double dy );
00801   
00810   Polyline translated( double dx, double dy ) const;
00811 
00812   Shape & scale( double sx, double sy );
00813 
00814   Shape & scale( double s );
00815

00825

00827

00835

00837       const TransformEPS & transform ) const;

00840      const TransformFIG & transform,
00841      std::map<DGtal::Color,int> & colormap ) const;

00845

00849 #endif

00866 struct Rectangle : public Polyline {
00867 
00868   inline Rectangle( double x, double y, double width, double height,
00869        DGtal::Color penColor, DGtal::Color fillColor,
00870        double lineWidth, 
00871        const LineStyle style = SolidStyle,
00872        const LineCap cap = ButtCap,
00873        const LineJoin join = MiterJoin,
00874         int depth = -1 );
00875 
00876   inline Rectangle( const Rect & rect,
00877         DGtal::Color penColor, DGtal::Color fillColor,
00878         double lineWidth,
00879         const LineStyle style = SolidStyle,
00880         const LineCap cap = ButtCap,
00881         const LineJoin join = MiterJoin,
00882         int depth = -1 );
00883 
00889   const std::string & name() const;
00890 
00891   double x() const { return _path[0].x; }
00892   double y() const { return _path[0].y; }
00893   double width() { return (_path[1] - _path[0]).norm(); }
00894   double height() { return (_path[0] - _path[3]).norm(); }
00895   Point topLeft() { return Point( _path[0].x, _path[0].y ); }
00896   Point topRight() { return Point( _path[1].x, _path[1].y ); }
00897   Point bottomLeft() { return Point( _path[3].x, _path[3].y ); }
00898   Point bottomRight() { return Point( _path[2].x, _path[2].y ); }
00899 
00900 
00909   Rectangle rotated( double angle, const Point & center )  const;
00910   
00918   Rectangle rotated( double angle ) const;
00919 
00928   Rectangle translated( double dx, double dy ) const;
00929 
00938   Rectangle scaled( double sx, double sy ) const;
00939 
00940   Rectangle scaled( double s ) const;
00941  
00948   void scaleAll( double s );
00949 
00950   void flushFIG( std::ostream & stream,
00951      const TransformFIG & transform,
00952      std::map<DGtal::Color,int> & colormap ) const;
00953 
00954   void flushSVG( std::ostream & stream,
00955      const TransformSVG & transform ) const;
00956 
00957 #ifdef WITH_CAIRO
00958   void flushCairo( cairo_t *cr,
00959      const TransformCairo & transform ) const;
00960 #endif
00961 
00962   Rectangle * clone() const;
00963 
00964 private:
00965   static const std::string _name; 
00967 protected:
00968   bool _isRectangle;
00969 };

01033 struct Triangle : public Polyline {
01034 
01035   Triangle( const Point & p1, const Point & p2, const Point & p3,
01036       DGtal::Color pen,
01037       DGtal::Color fill,
01038       double lineWidth,
01039       const LineStyle style = SolidStyle,
01040       const LineCap cap = ButtCap,
01041       const LineJoin join = MiterJoin,
01042       int depthValue = -1 )
01043     : Polyline( std::vector<Point>(), true, pen, fill, lineWidth, style, cap, join, depthValue ) {
01044     _path << p1;
01045     _path << p2;
01046     _path << p3;
01047   }
01048 
01049   Triangle( const double x1, const double y1, 
01050       const double x2, const double y2, 
01051       const double x3, const double y3,
01052       DGtal::Color pen,
01053       DGtal::Color fill,
01054       double lineWidth,
01055       const LineStyle style = SolidStyle,
01056       const LineCap cap = ButtCap,
01057       const LineJoin join = MiterJoin,
01058       int depthValue = -1 )
01059     : Polyline( std::vector<Point>(), true, pen, fill, lineWidth, style, cap, join, depthValue ) {
01060     _path << Point( x1, y1 );
01061     _path << Point( x2, y2 );
01062     _path << Point( x3, y3 );
01063   }
01064 
01070   const std::string & name() const;
01071 
01072   Triangle rotated( double angle ) const;
01073 
01082   Triangle translated( double dx, double dy ) const;
01083 
01092   Triangle scaled( double sx, double sy ) const;
01093 
01094   Triangle scaled( double s ) const;
01095 
01096   Triangle * clone() const;
01097   
01098 private:
01099   static const std::string _name; 
01101 protected:
01102 };

01222 struct Ellipse : public Shape {
01223   
01224   Ellipse( double x, double y, 
01225      double xRadius, double yRadius, 
01226      DGtal::Color pen, DGtal::Color fill,
01227      double lineWidth,
01228      const LineStyle lineStyle = SolidStyle,
01229      int depthValue = -1 )
01230     : Shape( pen, fill,
01231        lineWidth, lineStyle, ButtCap, MiterJoin, depthValue ),
01232       _center( x, y ), _xRadius( xRadius ), _yRadius( yRadius ),
01233       _angle( 0.0 ),
01234       _circle( false ) {
01235     while ( _angle > M_PI_2 ) _angle -= M_PI;
01236     while ( _angle < -M_PI_2 ) _angle += M_PI;
01237   }
01238 
01244   const std::string & name() const;
01245 
01246   Point center() const;
01247 
01248   Ellipse & rotate( double angle, const Point & center );
01249 
01258   Ellipse rotated( double angle, const Point & center ) const;
01259 
01260   Ellipse & rotate( double angle );
01261 
01269   Ellipse rotated( double angle ) const;
01270   
01271   Ellipse & translate( double dx, double dy );
01272 
01281   Ellipse translated( double dx, double dy ) const;
01282 
01283   Shape & scale( double sx, double sy );
01284 
01285   Shape & scale( double s );
01286 
01295   Ellipse scaled( double sx, double sy ) const;
01296 
01297   Ellipse scaled( double s ) const;
01298   
01305   void scaleAll( double s );
01306 
01307   void flushPostscript( std::ostream & stream,
01308       const TransformEPS & transform ) const;
01309 
01310   void flushFIG( std::ostream & stream,
01311      const TransformFIG & transform,
01312      std::map<DGtal::Color,int> & colormap ) const;
01313 
01314   void flushSVG( std::ostream & stream,
01315      const TransformSVG & transform ) const;
01316 
01317 #ifdef WITH_CAIRO
01318   void flushCairo( cairo_t *cr,
01319      const TransformCairo & transform ) const;
01320 #endif
01321 
01322   Rect boundingBox() const;
01323 
01324   Ellipse * clone() const;
01325 
01326 private:
01327   static const std::string _name; 
01329 protected:
01330   Point _center;
01331   double _xRadius; 
01332   double _yRadius;
01333   double _angle;
01334   bool _circle;
01335 };

01341 struct Circle : public Ellipse {
01342 
01343   Circle( double x, double y, double radius, 
01344     DGtal::Color pen, DGtal::Color fill,
01345     double lineWidth,
01346     const LineStyle style = SolidStyle,
01347     int depthValue = -1 )
01348     : Ellipse( x, y, radius, radius, pen, fill, lineWidth, style, depthValue )
01349   { _circle = true; }
01350 
01356   const std::string & name() const;
01357 
01358   Point center() const;
01359 
01360   Circle & rotate( double angle, const Point & center );
01361 
01362   Circle rotated( double angle, const Point & center ) const;
01363 
01364   Circle & rotate( double angle );
01365 
01366   Circle rotated( double angle ) const;
01367   
01368   Circle & translate( double dx, double dy );
01369 
01370   Circle translated( double dx, double dy ) const;
01371 
01372   Shape & scale( double sx, double sy );
01373 
01374   Shape & scale( double s );
01375 
01376   Circle scaled( double sx, double sy ) const;
01377 
01378   Circle scaled( double s ) const;
01379 
01386   void scaleAll( double s );
01387 
01388   virtual void flushSVG( std::ostream & stream,
01389      const TransformSVG & transform ) const;
01390 
01391 #ifdef WITH_CAIRO
01392   void flushCairo( cairo_t *cr,
01393      const TransformCairo & transform ) const;
01394 #endif
01395 
01396   Circle * clone() const;
01397 
01398 private:
01399   static const std::string _name; 
01400 };

01406 struct Arc : public Circle {
01407 
01408   Arc( double x, double y, double radius, double angle1, double angle2, bool negative,
